summary: This is my first mod, it\'s a simple retexture of the steelsword that makes it look better. Enjoy it!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, it\'s a simple retexture of the steelsword that makes it look better. Enjoy it!

Installation:

-Download the file manually.
-Extract the content (archive \'textures\') in your skyrim data folder.
-Search the sword in game and enjoy it!

Unistallation:
-Find the content of the archive \'textures\'.
-Simply delete it.

I hope to make better mods in the future for you people! ;)
author: Jargu
